document_data.mainbody:
ord Damaris Rowanmantle was a member of the noble Rowanmantle family of Cormyr in the 14 century DR.
In the , Lord Damaris attended King Azoun Obarskyr IVs birthday feast, hosted by Lord Partic Thistle at Thistleflame Keep. He was accompanied there by Lady Alasalynn Rowanmantle.
